widget.name: LocAge
widget.description:
LocAge is an online multiplayer map web/app system to manage/locate/be in touch with your family/team/extreme activity
website for registration (at the moment) is: http://design.ge/locage/
all groups are hidden for other users by default, but group admin can make a group public - so other "spectators" can watch movement of group members (e.x. watch car positions in an offroad competition or watch a team of climbers/hikers on the move)
widget.author: Cyborg-Mcloud
